tool.name: GDAL addo
tool.command: gdaladdo '$input1' -ro #if $levels!='e.g : 2 4 8 16' #if '$levels'=='' -clean #else '$levels' --config COMPRESS_OVERVIEW DEFLATE && cp '$input1''.ovr' 'output_ovr' #end if #else -clean #end if

param.name: levels
param.label: levels
param.help: A list of integral overview levels to build.

tool.help:
The gdaladdo utility can be used to build or rebuild overview images for most supported file formats with one of several downsampling algorithms.
http://www.gdal.org
http://www.gdal.org/gdaladdo.html
Raster Processing Tutorial : https://trac.osgeo.org/gdal/wiki/UserDocs/RasterProcTutorial
